'''''maika''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "sharp, piercing",<ref name=SApp>{{S|Appendix}}</ref> or "blade of a cutting tool or weapon, especially sword-blade".<ref name=VT39>{{VT|39a}}, p. 11</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] MAK ("cut, hew with a sharp edge")<ref name=VT39/>
==See also==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[maeg]]''<ref name=SApp/>
